data.actual_result: The white colour almost completely matches to it's surrounding colour and only green 'X' can be seen.
data.expected_result: It is in a colour that can be seen.
data.short_description: The colour of the Xbox icon completely matches to it's surroundings on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Go to Settings>Connections. - Click on "ADD". - Look at Xbox's icon.
